label: Click To Edit
description: Demonstrates inline editing of a data object

label: Bulk Update
description: Demonstrates bulk updating of multiple rows of data

label: Click To Load
description: Demonstrates clicking to load more rows in a table

label: Delete Row
description: Demonstrates row deletion in a table

label: Edit Row
description: Demonstrates how to edit rows in a table

label: Lazy Loading
description: Demonstrates how to lazy load content

label: Inline Validation
description: Demonstrates how to do inline field validation

label: Infinite Scroll
description: Demonstrates infinite scrolling of a page

label: Active Search
description: Demonstrates the active search box pattern

label: Progress Bar
description: Demonstrates a job-runner like progress bar

label: Value Select
description: Demonstrates making the values of a select dependent on another select

label: Animations
description: Demonstrates various animation techniques

label: File Upload
description: Demonstrates how to upload a file via ajax with a progress bar

label: Preserving File Inputs after Form Errors
description: Demonstrates how to preserve file inputs after form errors

label: Reset User Input
description: Demonstrates how to reset form inputs after submission

label: Dialogs - Browser
description: Demonstrates the prompt and confirm dialogs

label: Dialogs - UIKit
description: Demonstrates modal dialogs using UIKit

label: Dialogs - Bootstrap
description: Demonstrates modal dialogs using Bootstrap

label: Dialogs - Custom
description: Demonstrates modal dialogs from scratch

label: Tabs (Using HATEOAS)
description: Demonstrates how to display and select tabs using HATEOAS principles

label: Tabs (Using JavaScript)
description: Demonstrates how to display and select tabs using JavaScript

label: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Demonstrates how to create keyboard shortcuts for htmx enabled elements

label: Drag & Drop / Sortable
description: Demonstrates how to use htmx with the Sortable.js plugin to implement drag-and-drop reordering

label: Updating Other Content
description: Demonstrates how to update content beyond just the target elements

label: Confirm
description: Demonstrates how to implement a custom confirmation dialog with htmx

label: Async Authentication
description: Demonstrates how to handle async authentication tokens in htmx

label: Web Components
description: Demonstrates how to integrate htmx with web components and shadow DOM

label: (Experimental) moveBefore()-powered hx-preserve
description: htmx will use the experimental moveBefore() API for moving elements, if it is present.
